blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body: In the below example, serverUrl and roomId are reactive values, so they both must be specified as dependencies. As a result, selecting a different room in the dropdown or editing the server URL input causes the chat to re-connect. However, since message isn’t used in the Effect (and so it isn’t a dependency), editing the message doesn’t re-connect to the chat.Reactive values include props and all variables and functions declared directly inside of your component. Since roomId and serverUrl are reactive values, you can’t remove them from the dependency list. If you try to omit them and your linter is correctly configured for React, the linter will flag this as a mistake that you need to fix
blogs.author: mario
